name: Adhere
description: Object is covered in extremely sticky slime.

name: Animate Object
description: Object obeys your commands as best it can. It can walk 15ft per round.

name: Anthropomorphize
description: A touched animal either gains human intelligence or human appearance for L days.

name: Arcane Eye
description: You can see through a magical floating eyeball that flies around at your command.

name: Astral Prison
description: An object is frozen in time and space within an invulnerable crystal shell.

name: Attract
description: L+1 objects are strongly magnetically attracted to each other if they come within 10 feet.

name: Auditory Illusion
description: You create illusory sounds that seem to come from a direction of your choice.

name: Babble
description: A creature must loudly and clearly repeat everything you think. It is otherwise mute.

name: Beast Form
description: You and your possessions transform into a mundane animal.

name: Befuddle
description: L creatures of your choice are unable to form new short-term memories for the duration of the spell.

name: Bend Fate
description: Roll L+1 d20s. Whenever you must roll a d20 after casting the spell, you must choose and then discard one of the rolled results until they are all gone.

name: Bird Person
description: Your arms turn into huge bird wings.

name: Body Swap
description: You switch bodies with a creature you touch. If one body dies, the other dies as well.

name: Catherine
description: A woman wearing a blue dress appears until end of spell. She will obey polite, safe requests.

name: Charm
description: L creatures treat you like a friend.

name: Command
description: A creature obeys a single, three-word command that does not harm it.

name: Comprehend
description: You become fluent in all languages.

name: Control Plants
description: Nearby plants and trees obey you and gain the ability to move at 5 feet per round.

name: Control Weather
description: You may alter the type of weather at will, but you do not otherwise control it.

name: Counterspell
description: Make an opposed Intelligence save against the Intelligence of the caster of a nearby spell. You may do this out of turn as a reaction, or against an ongoing magical effect. On a success, you may cancel the spell.

name: Deafen
description: All nearby creatures are deafened.

name: Detect Magic
description: You hear nearby magical auras singing. Volume and harmony signify the aura’s power and refinement.

name: Disassemble
description: Any of your body parts may be detached and reattached at will, without causing pain or damage. You can still control them.

name: Disguise
description: You may alter the appearance of L characters at will as long as they remain humanoid. Attempts to duplicate other characters will seem uncanny.

name: Displace
description: An object appears to be up to L×10ft from its actual position.

name: Earthquake
description: The ground begins shaking violently. Structures may be damaged or collapse.

name: Elasticity
description: Your body can stretch up to L×10ft.

name: Elemental Wall
description: A straight wall of ice or fire L×40ft long and 10ft high rises from the ground.

name: Filch
description: L visible items teleport to your hands.

name: Fog Cloud
description: Dense fog spreads out from you.

name: Frenzy
description: L creatures erupt in a frenzy of violence.

name: Gate
description: A portal to a random plane opens.

name: Gravity Shift
description: You can change the direction of gravity (for yourself only) up to once per round.

name: Greed
description: L creatures develop an overwhelming urge to possess a visible item of your choice.

name: Haste
description: Your movement speed is tripled.

name: Hatred
description: L creatures develop a deep hatred of another creature or group of creatures and wish to destroy it.

name: Hear Whispers
description: You can hear faint sounds clearly.

name: Hover
description: An object hovers, frictionless, 2ft above the ground. It can hold up to L humanoids.

name: Hypnotize
description: A creature enters a trance and will truthfully answer L yes or no questions you ask it.

name: Icy Touch
description: A thick ice layer spreads across a touched surface, up to L×10ft in radius.

name: Illuminate
description: A floating light moves as you command.

name: Increase Gravity
description: The gravity in an area triples.

name: Invisible Tether
description: Two objects within 10ft of each other cannot be moved more than 10ft apart.

name: Knock
description: L nearby mundane or magical locks unlock.

name: Leap
description: You can jump up to L×10ft in the air.

name: Liquid Air
description: The air around you becomes swimmable.

name: Magic Dampener
description: All nearby magical effects have their effectiveness halved.

name: Manse
description: A sturdy, furnished cottage appears for L×12 hours. You can permit and forbid entry to it at will.

name: Marble Madness
description: Your pockets are full of marbles, and will refill every round.

name: Masquerade
description: L characters’ appearances and voices become identical to a touched character.

name: Miniaturize
description: You and L other touched creatures are reduced to the size of a mouse.

name: Mirror Image
description: L illusory duplicates of yourself appear under your control.

name: Mirrorwalk
description: A mirror becomes a gateway to another mirror that you looked into today.

name: Multiarm
description: You gain L extra arms.

name: Night Sphere
description: An L×40ft wide sphere of darkness displaying the night sky appears.

name: Objectify
description: You become any inanimate object between the size of a grand piano and an apple.

name: Ooze Form
description: You become a living jelly.

name: Pacify
description: L creatures have an aversion to violence.

name: Phantom Coach
description: A ghostly coach appears until end of spell. It moves unnaturally fast over any terrain, including water.

name: Phobia
description: L creatures become terrified of an object of your choice.

name: Pit
description: A pit 10ft wide and L×5ft deep opens in the ground.

name: Primeval Surge
description: An object grows to the size of an elephant. If it is an animal, it is enraged.

name: Psychometry
description: The referee answers L yes or no questions about a touched object.

name: Pull
description: An object of any size is pulled directly towards you with the strength of L men for one round.

name: Push
description: An object of any size is pushed directly away from you with the strength of L men for one round.

name: Raise Dead
description: L skeletons rise from the ground to serve you. They are incredibly stupid and can only obey simple orders.

name: Raise Spirit
description: The spirit of a dead body manifests and will answer L questions.

name: Read Mind
description: You can hear the surface thoughts of nearby creatures.

name: Repel
description: L+1 objects are strongly magnetically repelled from each other if they come within 10 feet.

name: Scry
description: You can see through the eyes of a creature you touched earlier today.

name: Sculpt Elements
description: All inanimate material behaves like clay in your hands.

name: Shroud
description: L creatures are invisible until they move.

name: Shuffle
description: L creatures instantly switch places. Determine where they end up randomly.

name: Sleep
description: L creatures fall into a light sleep.

name: Smoke Form
description: Your body becomes living smoke.

name: Snail Knight
description: 10 minutes after casting, a knight sitting astride a giant snail rides into view. He is able to answer most questions related to quests and chivalry, and may aid you if he finds you worthy.

name: Sniff
description: You can smell even the faintest traces of scents.

name: Sort
description: Inanimate items sort themselves according to categories you set. The categories must be visually verifiable.

name: Spectacle
description: A clearly unreal but impressive illusion of your choice appears, under your control. It may be up to the size of a palace and has full motion and sound.

name: Spellseize
description: Cast this as a reaction to another spell going off to make a temporary copy of it that you can cast at any time before this spell ends.

name: Spider Climb
description: You can climb surfaces like a spider.

name: Summon Cube
description: Once per second, (6 times per round) you may summon or banish a 3-foot-wide cube of earth. New cubes must be affixed to the earth or to other cubes.

name: Swarm
description: You become a swarm of crows, rats, or piranhas. You only take damage from area effects.

name: Telekinesis
description: You may mentally move L items.

name: Telepathy
description: L+1 creatures can hear each other’s thoughts, no matter how far apart they move.

name: Teleport
description: An object disappears and reappears on the ground in a visible, clear area up to L×40ft away.

name: Thaumaturgic Anchor
description: Object becomes the target of every spell cast near it.

name: Thicket
description: A thicket of trees and dense brush up to L×40ft wide suddenly sprouts up.

name: Time Jump
description: An object disappears as it jumps L×10 minutes into the future. When it returns, it appears in the unoccupied area nearest to where it left.

name: Summon Idol
description: A carved stone statue the size of a four poster bed rises from the ground.

name: Time Rush
description: Time in a 40ft bubble starts moving 10 times faster.

name: Time Slow
description: Time in a 40ft bubble slows to 10%.

name: True Sight
description: You see through all nearby illusions.

name: Upwell
description: A spring of seawater appears.

name: Vision
description: You completely control what a creature sees.

name: Visual Illusion
description: A silent, immobile, illusion of your choice appears, up to the size of a bedroom.

name: Ward
description: A silver circle 40ft across appears on the ground. Choose one thing that cannot cross it: Living creatures, dead creatures, projectiles or metal.

name: Web
description: Your wrists can shoot thick webbing.

name: Wizard Mark
description: Your finger can shoot a stream of ulfire-colored paint. This paint is only visible to you, and can be seen at any distance, even through solid objects.

name: X-Ray Vision
description: You gain X-Ray vision.
